main event: A witness observed a dark-colored ball-shaped object traveling at a high rate of speed in the sky.
interesting points: The object was the size of a basketball.,The sighting lasted for approximately 3 seconds.,The object was seen by a police officer in the area.,The conclusion of the sighting was categorized as unidentified.,Possible explanations include balloon, aircraft, or astronomical event.
witness description: one witness and a police officer in the area
